description.compact:
WorkDocument Line
 <xs:element name="Line" maxOccurs="unbounded">  <xs:complexType>      <xs:sequence>          <xs:element ref="LineNumber"/>          <xs:element name="OrderReferences"                      type="OrderReferences" minOccurs="0"                      maxOccurs="unbounded"/>          <xs:element ref="ProductCode"/>          <xs:element ref="ProductDescription"/>          <xs:element ref="Quantity"/>          <xs:element ref="UnitOfMeasure"/>          <xs:element ref="UnitPrice"/>          <xs:element ref="TaxBase" minOccurs="0"/>          <xs:element ref="TaxPointDate"/>          <xs:element name="References" type="References"                      minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>          <xs:element ref="Description"/>          <xs:element name="ProductSerialNumber"                      type="ProductSerialNumber" minOccurs="0"/>          <xs:choice>              <xs:element ref="DebitAmount"/>              <xs:element ref="CreditAmount"/>          </xs:choice>          <xs:element name="Tax" type="Tax"/>          <xs:element ref="TaxExemptionReason" minOccurs="0"/>          <xs:element ref="TaxExemptionCode" minOccurs="0"/>          <xs:element ref="SettlementAmount" minOccurs="0"/>          <xs:element name="CustomsInformation"                      type="CustomsInformation" minOccurs="0"/>      </xs:sequence>  </xs:complexType> </xs:element>
<xs:element name="References" type="References" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> Node name

<xs:element name="References" type="References" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> 
   <xs:complexType name="OrderReferences">       <xs:sequence>           <xs:element ref="OriginatingON" minOccurs="0"/>           <xs:element ref="OrderDate" minOccurs="0"/>       </xs:sequence>   </xs:complexType>

Get TaxBase
Unit taxable amount that does not contribute for the NetTotal field.

docblock.description: This value is the basis for calculating the line taxes. The sign (debit or credit) with which the tax, thus, calculated contributes for the TaxPayable field results from the existence within the line of the DebitAmount or CreditAmount fields.

description.compact:
Set TaxBase
Unit taxable amount that does not contribute for the NetTotal field.

docblock.description: This value is the basis for calculating the line taxes. The sign (debit or credit) with which the tax, thus, calculated contributes for the TaxPayable field results from the existence within the line of the DebitAmount or CreditAmount fields.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get TaxPointDate
Date of the dispatch of the goods or of the delivery of the service.

Set TaxPointDate
Date of the dispatch of the goods or of the delivery of the service.

Get Refrences stack
References to invoices on the correspondent correcting documents.

docblock.description: If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can be generated as many times as necessary.

description.compact:
Create a new Reference instance and add to the stack then return for populate with values
References to invoices on the correspondent correcting documents.

docblock.description: If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can be generated as many times as necessary.

description.compact:
Get Tax
If the instance is not created, a Tax instance will be created and returned to be populated
This structure shall only be created for documents with a value in the database.
Parse the xml represented in thist trati

comment.value: Test node name and parse LineNumber, credit and debit

description.compact: <xs:element name="OrderReferences" type="OrderReferences" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> Node name

GetOrderReferences
References to invoices on the correspondent correcting documents.

AddOrderReferences
If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can be generated as many times as necessary
Every time that this method is invoked a new instance of OrderReferences is created, add to the stack and returned to be populaed
<xs:element name="OrderReferences" type="OrderReferences" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>

Get ProductCode
Record Key related to table 2.4. â Product in field 2.4.2. - ProductCode.
<xs:element ref="ProductCode"/>
<xs:element name="ProductCode" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

Set ProductCode
Record Key related to table 2.4. â Product in field 2.4.2. - ProductCode.
<xs:element ref="ProductCode"/>
<xs:element name="ProductCode" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax60Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get ProductDescription
Description of the invoice line, related to table 2.4. â Product in field 2.4.4. â ProductDescription.

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="ProductDescription"/>
<xs:element name="ProductDescription" type="SAFPTProductDescription"/>
<xs:simpleType name="SAFPTProductDescription">
 <xs:annotation/>
 <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
     <xs:minLength value="2"/>
     <xs:maxLength value="200"/>
 </xs:restriction>
</xs:simpleType>

description.compact:
Set ProductDescriptionet ProductDescription

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="ProductDescription"/>
<xs:element name="ProductDescription" type="SAFPTProductDescription"/>
<xs:simpleType name="SAFPTProductDescription">
 <xs:annotation/>
 <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
     <xs:minLength value="2"/>
     <xs:maxLength value="200"/>
 </xs:restriction>
</xs:simpleType>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get UnitPrice
Price per Unit without tax, and after the deduction of the line and header discounts.

Set UnitPrice
Price per Unit without tax, and after the deduction of the line and header discounts.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
GetProductSerialNumber
When this method is invoked and $create is true a new instance of ProductSerialNumber will be created, if not previousm, add to the stack and returned to be populaed
<xs:element name="ProductSerialNumber" type="ProductSerialNumber" minOccurs="0"/>

param.description: If true a new instance will be created if wasn't previous

description.compact:
Get CustomsInformation
When this method is invoked and $create is true a new instance of CustomsInformation will be created, if not previousm, add to the stack and returned to be populaed
<xs:element name="CustomsInformation" type="CustomsInformation" minOccurs="0"/>

param.description: If true a new instance will be created if wasn't previous

description.compact: Create xml nodefor Credit and Debit
Create the TaxExemptionReason, TaxExemptionCode, SettlementAmount, CustomsInformation nodes

Get LineNumber
Lines should be exported in the same order as on the original receipt.
<xs:element ref="LineNumber"/>

Set LineNumber
Lines should be exported in the same order as on the original receipt.
<xs:element ref="LineNumber"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get Tax ExemptionReason
When fields 4.3.4.14.15.4. - TaxPercentage or 4.3.4.14.15.5. - TaxAmount fields are equal to zero, it is required to fill in this field.

Set Tax ExemptionReason
When fields 4.3.4.14.15.4. - TaxPercentage or 4.3.4.14.15.5. - TaxAmount fields are equal to zero, it is required to fill in this field.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Get TaxExemptionCode
It shall be filled in with the code of the reason for exemption or non-settlement, which is included in the "Manual de IntegraÃ§Ã£o de Software â ComunicaÃ§Ã£o das Faturas Ã  AT" (Software Integration Manual - Communication of the Invoices to Tax and Customs Authority).

docblock.description:
The filling is required when fields 4.1.4.19.15.4. - TaxPercentage or 4.1.4.19.15.5. - Tax amount are equal to zero. This field shall also be filled in, for the cases not to subject to the taxes mentioned in table 2.5. - TaxTable.
<xs:element ref="TaxExemptionCode" minOccurs="0"/>

description.compact:
Set TaxExemptionCode
It shall be filled in with the code of the reason for exemption or non-settlement, which is included in the "Manual de IntegraÃ§Ã£o de Software â ComunicaÃ§Ã£o das Faturas Ã  AT" (Software Integration Manual - Communication of the Invoices to Tax and Customs Authority).

docblock.description:
The filling is required when fields 4.1.4.19.15.4. - TaxPercentage or 4.1.4.19.15.5. - Tax amount are equal to zero. This field shall also be filled in, for the cases not to subject to the taxes mentioned in table 2.5. - TaxTable.
<xs:element ref="TaxExemptionCode" minOccurs="0"/>

description.compact:
Get SettlementAmount
Shall present all the discounts (the proportion of global discounts for this line and the specific of the same line) affecting the amount on field 4.1.4.20.3. â GrossTotal.
<xs:element ref="SettlementAmount" minOccurs="0"/>

set SettlementAmount
Shall present all the discounts (the proportion of global discounts for this line and the specific of the same line) affecting the amount on field 4.1.4.20.3. â GrossTotal.
<xs:element ref="SettlementAmount" minOccurs="0"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid
